DOC.brief_title: The Anesthetic Efficacy 3 % Mepivacaine Plus 2 % Lidocaine With 1:100,000 Epinephrine Lower Jaw Dental Injections
DOC.detailed_description: One hundred adult male female subject randomly receive two set inferior alveolar block injection ( shot ) consist injection 1.8 mL 3 % mepivacaine follow 1.8 mL 2 % lidocaine 1:100,000 epinephrine , injection 1.8 mL 2 % lidocaine 1:100,000 epinephrine follow 1.8 mL 2 % lidocaine 1:100,000 epinephrine , two separate appointment space least two week apart , crossover design . Whether subject receives mepivacaine lidocaine first injection determine randomly . The doctor know whether subject receives mepivacaine lidocaine first injection . The subject know anesthetic he/she receives . A pulp tester use test lower jaw teeth ( molar , premolar , incisor ) anesthesia ( numbness ) 4-minute time cycle 60 minute . The pain IAN block injection also record . The data statistically analyze .
